price: El injusto morderá sus propias manos [lamentándose] y dirá: "¡Ojalá hubiera seguido el camino del Mensajero!
arabic: وَيَوۡمَ يَعَضُّ ٱلظَّالِمُ عَلَىٰ يَدَيۡهِ يَقُولُ يَٰلَيۡتَنِي ٱتَّخَذۡتُ مَعَ ٱلرَّسُولِ سَبِيلٗا

version.title: Spanish Translation - Isa Garcia
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Spanish by Muhammad Isa Garcia - Printed in 1433 H.

meta.transliteration: wayawma yaʿaḍḍu al-ẓālimu ʿalā yadayhi yaqūlu yālaytanī ittakhadhtu maʿa al-rasūli sabīlan
